starters.name: Bulbasaur
starters.description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

starters.name: Charmander
starters.description: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. It is said that Charmander's flame burns brighter if it is in good health.

starters.name: Squirtle
starters.description: Squirtle's shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.

starters.name: Chikorita
starters.description: Chikorita emits a sweet fragrance from the leaf on its head that has calming effects. It's known to gently sway its leaf to create a relaxing environment.

starters.name: Cyndaquil
starters.description: Cyndaquil is a timid Pokémon that protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. It can create intense fire when it feels threatened.

starters.name: Totodile
starters.description: Despite its small size, Totodile's powerful jaws are capable of crushing anything. It sometimes forgets its strength and accidentally bites down too hard.

starters.name: Treecko
starters.description: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. It attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.

starters.name: Torchic
starters.description: Torchic sticks with its Trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. It breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, occasionally causing it to scorch itself.

starters.name: Mudkip
starters.description: The fin on Mudkip's head acts as a highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, Mudkip can determine what's happening around it without using its eyes.

starters.name: Turtwig
starters.description: Photosynthesis occurs across Turtwig's body as it basks in the sunlight. If it becomes thirsty, the leaf on its head wilts.

starters.name: Chimchar
starters.description: Chimchar's fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire, which burns brighter when Chimchar is agitated.

starters.name: Piplup
starters.description: Piplup has a layer of fine down covering its body, providing protection against the cold. It is a poor walker and often falls down, but it is a proud Pokémon.

starters.name: Snivy
starters.description: Snivy is a calm and intelligent Pokémon. When it raises its tail upright, it can perform photosynthesis. By using sunlight, it can recover energy faster.

starters.name: Tepig
starters.description: Tepig blows fire from its nose. When it's not feeling well, it lets out smoke instead. It is a warm and friendly Pokémon that enjoys eating.

starters.name: Oshawott
starters.description: Oshawott uses the shell on its belly as a weapon in battle. It is known for being brave and has no qualms about taking on powerful opponents.
